name: R5-GraphDefinition-R4-GraphDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 GraphDefinition into FHIR R4

element.display: Definition of a graph of resources

target.display: Definition of a graph of resources
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition`

target.display: Contact details for the publisher
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.contact`

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.contained`

target.display: Date last changed
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.date`

element.display: Natural language description of the graph definition

target.display: Natural language description of the graph definition
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.description` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.description`

element.display: For testing purposes, not real usage

target.display: For testing purposes, not real usage
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.experimental` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.experimental`

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `GraphDefinition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.id`

element.display: Additional identifier for the GraphDefinition (business identifier)
A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.implicitRules`

element.display: Intended jurisdiction for graph definition (if applicable)

target.display: Intended jurisdiction for graph definition (if applicable)
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.jurisdiction`

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `GraphDefinition.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: Links this graph makes rules about

target.display: Links this graph makes rules about
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.link` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.link`

element.display: Patient | Encounter | RelatedPerson | Practitioner | Device | EpisodeOfCare
Custom rule, as a FHIRPath expression
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Why this link is specified
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.link.description` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.link.description`

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.link.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `GraphDefinition.link.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.link.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.link.id`

target.display: Maximum occurrences for this link
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.link.max` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.link.max`

target.display: Minimum occurrences for this link
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.link.min` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.link.min`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.link.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `GraphDefinition.link.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Path in the resource that contains the link

target.display: Path in the resource that contains the link
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.link.path` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.link.path`

target.display: Which slice (if profiled)
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.link.sliceName` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.link.sliceName`

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.meta`

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `GraphDefinition.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name for this graph definition (computer friendly)

target.display: Name for this graph definition (computer friendly)
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.name`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Internal ID - target for link references
Type of resource this link refers to
Name of the publisher/steward (organization or individual)

target.display: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.publisher` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.publisher`

element.display: Why this graph definition is defined

target.display: Why this graph definition is defined
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.purpose` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.purpose`

target.display: Type of resource at which the graph starts
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.start` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `GraphDefinition.start` - start made the element mandatory; start increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1; start added a required binding to http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/resource-types|4.0.1; start has change due to type change: R5 start id has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 start

target.display: draft | active | retired | unknown
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.text`

element.display: Name for this graph definition (human friendly)
Canonical identifier for this graph definition, represented as a URI (globally unique)

target.display: Canonical identifier for this graph definition, represented as a URI (globally unique)
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.url` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.url`

element.display: The context that the content is intended to support

target.display: The context that the content is intended to support
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.useContext` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.useContext`

element.display: Business version of the graph definition

target.display: Business version of the graph definition
target.comment: R5 `GraphDefinition.version` maps as Equivalent to R4 `GraphDefinition.version`
